Bases: object

finalize()¶
get_logger(name)¶
system_status()¶
write_xml(out_path, points=[], labels=[], colors=[], rois=[], roi_labels=[], roi_colors=[])¶

write the dot(point) annotations in xml format of ASAP write the rois as rectangle annotations if provided :returns: None; writes the xml output to file

Parameters

  • is where the output xml file will be dumped to. (out_path) –

  • point is a 2D x and y coordinate, with a label and a color. (each) –

  • is a list of x,y coordinates (points) – m by 1(list of 2 coords)

  • is a list of point labels (labels) – m by 1

  • is a list of point colors (colors) – m by 1

  • is a list of rectangles (rois) – n by 1; each in the shape of: [[x_min, y_min], [x_max, y_max]]

  • is a list of rectangle labels (roi_labels) – n by 1

  • is a list of rectangle colors (roi_colors) – n by 1
